definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="baseRate" type="Number">baseRate</variable><variable id="rateWithAmplifier" type="Number">rateWithAmplifier</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:baseRate</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This is how many ticks it takes to activate the effect when the level is 1</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Lower values will make the effect faster.</comment></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:rateWithAmplifier</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This is how many ticks it takes to activate the effect at any level</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">DIVIDE</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Each level makes the effect twice as fast</comment><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:baseRate</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">POWER</field><value name="A"><block type="number_variable"><field name="variable">radiation_sickness_scaling</field><field name="config">CUSTOM:RadioactiveCFG</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">amplifier</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="entity_nbt_num_set"><comment h="50" pinned="false" w="286">Sets an NBT number tag and adds one number to that tag each time the procedure is run.</comment><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">radDamageCounter</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_num_get"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">radDamageCounter</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="return_logic"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This is true every "rateWithAmplifier" ticks</comment><value name="return"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MOD</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_num_get"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">radDamageCounter</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_singular_ops"><field name="OP">ROUNDDOWN</field><value name="NUM"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:rateWithAmplifier</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
